title: Easy FTP Misconfiguration
description: A simple challenge to exploit a misconfigured FTP server.
hints: The FTP server uses default credentials you might expect for testing.
Search for any text files within the FTP directory.
The flag is inside a file named flag.txt located in the FTP user's home directory.
learningObjectives: Learn about common misconfigurations in FTP servers.
Practice accessing FTP servers using client tools.
